q1: What has been your best games this season?
a1: I haven't, personally, played any games this year.
q2: I don't really follow PSG much.
a2: PSG has too big of a media presence to not follow.
q3: I do not agree with them, Paris SG is a great team
a3: What makes them such a great team?
q4: Paris SG spent too much money on Neymar. Watch Neymar leave PSG next year.
a4: If Neymar leaves Paris SG, he would probably end up at Real Madrid.
q5: There is no way Paris SG will allow that.
